ANGEL: An incorporeal and sometimes divine messenger from a deity, or other divine entity, often depicted in art as a youthful winged figure in flowing robes.
BUTTERFLY: A flying insect of the order Lepidoptera, distinguished from moths by their diurnal activity and generally brighter colouring.
DRAGON: A legendary serpentine or reptilian creature.
FAIRY: The realm of faerie; enchantment, illusion.
GRIFFIN: A mythical beast having the body of a lion and the wings and head of an eagle.
STORK: A large wading bird with long legs and a long beak of the family Ciconiidae.
